articles.title: In Portugal vote, tight race and far right gains could be bellwether for Europe - The Washington Post
articles.description: The shape and longevity of a new government will depend on the final tallies and the political horse-trading that follows.
articles.content: The ruling Socialists conceded defeat in one of the closest elections in Portuguese history, saying they would not challenge the victory of a center-right alliance in a vote that also saw major gains… [+6087 chars]

articles.author: Greg Wehner
articles.title: Apple reverses course, allows Epic Games to launch Fortnite app in EU - Fox Business
articles.description: Apple changed its decision from last week to block Epic Games from opening its own online marketplace for iPhones and iPads on Friday, allowing for the store to open in Europe.
articles.content:
Apple reversed its decision to block Fortnite video game developer Epic Games from launching its own online marketplace for iPhones and iPads in Europe on Friday and has now cleared the way.

articles.title: Netanyahu vows to defy Biden's 'red line' on Rafah - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Israel PM insists his priority is to prevent another terror attack like the Oct. 7 Hamas raid.
